alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Duchesne County through 445 PM MDT... At 400 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Starvation Reservoir, or 12 miles west of Duchesne, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Duchesne, Starvation Reservoir, Upalco, Arcadia, Talmage, Utahn and Bridgeland. This includes the following highways... US Route 40 between mile markers 71 and 95. Utah Route 35 between mile markers 50 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin
